author: Gaurav Kalani
text: 'Loved the ambience and the coffee. Will try the Turkish coffee the next time'

author: Nitesh Maurya
text: "Staff is very polite and they know their coffee well. That's what every person needs before they start their hustle. What's more pleasing is that it's dog friendly and my joey just loves to hang out. Not to mention the doggy treats they dish out for my boy."

author: vrinda chopra
text: 'The rose latte was tasty and unique but a little overpriced overall!'

author: Jay Mattan

author: kate dubitski
text: 'Service was warm and friendly. My fussy coffee order was delicious. The baklava was amazing! The place looks so good
column5: you can see that a lot of care and love went into the place!'

author: Darya Macarchik
text: 'Absolutely delicious coffee
column5: pastries and sweets! The cafe is so nice
column6: beautifully decorated and the service is outstanding!'

author: Amer A
text: 'Very quaint and cute place. The aroma that floats in the air is charming! The decor is unique. However
column5: there is an inconsistency in the coffee execution. From the two cappuccino I ordered at the same time
column6: one was balanced and tasted like a cappuccino
column7: the other was scalding hot milk with barely a hint of coffee taste. I may give the place another chance
column8: but with all the new coffee shops opening in the area

author: Mac ER
text: 'Incredible local coffee!!! Just try! Not only coffee also other products as well!!!!! GREAT!!!'

author: busra aydin
text: 'The rose latte and macarons taste awesome!! Also the decorations is so cute...'

author: Michael Wu
text: 'Nice quiet cafe with fresh pastries and macarons. Recommend the almond croissant
column5: flat white with oatly oat milk

author: Makensey Lindaberry
text: 'Absolutely gorgeous! This is my favorite coffee shop in Hoboken. It has a beautiful atmosphere & the staff is incredibly sweet! The coffee is great and the pastries are delicious! The rose latte is one of the most beautiful cups of coffee I have ever had in my life. They also have a punch card program where after 10 cups of coffee you get the next one free. I recommend this place with the highest regards!'

author: CurlsnPearlsss
text: 'Upon entering this cafe
column5: I fell in love with the vintage vibes and beautiful decor. I ordered a rose latte which was absolutely gorgeous and tasted like rose macarons. The avocado hummus toast was amazing as well. Customer service was excellent! So happy to have found this gem!'

author: Paola Leon
text: 'LOVED IT'

author: Rob Chacon
text: 'really cool coffee spot
column5: a must try if you‚Äôre in the area.'

text: 'LOVE THIS PLACEüòçüòçüòç so adorable and very beautiful
column5: the details are too cute and everything tasted so yummy!! They even have the cutest little pieces of jewelry to buy! Very vintagy!üåπ'

author: Eric Dore
text: 'One of the best coffee shops in Hoboken. The staff is amazing and the coffee is delicious. I go pretty much every morning. Highly recommend it.'

author: Michelle Light
text: 'The chai latte here is perfect. I went with a friend and she got the peppermint tea. We met Ozzie (sp?) She was soooo sweet! Loved the interior and the pastry case was full of delicious and beautiful pastries. Will be coming back here again!'

author: Tasha Tokar
text: "Outstanding experience and might be the cutest coffee I've ever found! The entire place seems like out of old Paris

author: Alisa Ali
text: 'Amazing service and beautiful lattes! The rose latte not only looks gorgeous but tastes delicious
column5: and came with a macaron. We also ordered iced lattes on our way out
column6: which tasted rich - great quality espresso. The women who work here are so kind and sweet. Highly recommend and I would love to come again!'

author: J
text: 'Loved this cafe ! Clean
column6: welcoming. Rose latte was my fav and avocado toast w/peppers! Definitely coming back'

author: Stephanie D
text: 'Really cute cafe with fantastic drinks and lovely staff! The hummus avocado toast was one of the best I‚Äôve ever had and the rose latte was delicious! Definitely will be back here'

author: Lyla Mannoia
text: 'I‚Äôve been here a few times now
column5: each time hoping for the best. Nope. This place won‚Äôt be my first choice until things change. They have the most overpriced teas in all of Hoboken
column6: maybe all of New Jersey. And not only are the teas overpriced
column7: they‚Äôre usually anemic. I‚Äôve been disappointed each time.'

author: Merve Sky
text: 'Avocado toast is delicious!!!'

author: Des KF
text: "When I arrived I had to park illegally because parking in the area is terrible. The place had indoor and outdoor seating.  The place was super cute and I loved the decor. I was greeted by Balseyat
column5: I believe she was the owner or manager and she was so kind. I got the baklava
column6: which I was eager to try because it was my first time
column7: and was supposed to get coffee. I told her I wasn't a huge coffee drinker so she offered me mint tea which was so nice of her. While waiting customers came in and one of which had a dog. So this place is dog friendly.  Balseyat gave me my items and I left.\n\nWhile driving home I was trying to drink the tea but the lid kept leaking a lot. It was dripping all over. Nothing was wrong with the lid
column8: I just think they probably need better lids or cups. When I got home I I ate the baklava and it was just ok. It was very sweet but glad I finally got a chance to try."

author: Xiping Dai
text: 'Great new poace!'

author: Miguel Perez
text: 'Love this place! Everything here is great!'

author: Tess L
text: 'Amazing spot for coffee and snacks.\nEverything has beautiful presentation and the owner is very very nice.'

author: Dean Locke
text: 'Worth going out of your way for. Delicious.'

text: 'Delicious pastry
column5: peaceful atmosphere. Coffee is the best.'

author: Andrew Holloway

author: Jefferson Thomas
text: 'That is the first time that I tried ice version. But definitely worth it. Awesome ü§©'

author: Hilal Kahya
text: "That was a nice experience. I have never seen the place before. It was like a European style coffee shop. I believe they are new in town.  But coffee was top of the line and venue is good for studying for me. prices were also really cheap.   Unfortunately I couldn't stay very long due to current pandemic situation but this is the plan when this is all over."

author: Samantha
text: "I'd avoid getting their matcha lattes. I got one over the weekend and it basically tasted like just ice milk. There barely any matcha in it. The latte was a pale green color unlike the pictures of matcha they post on Instagram which is vibrant dark green. Not worth the money."

author: Katarzyna ≈Åugowska
text: 'Greta ice tea! I will definitely come back!'

author: Victoria Tobio
text: 'I have been coming here nearly everyday since they opened two weeks ago. The coffee and iced tea are super delicious! Don‚Äôt care for Starbucks anymore with this local place selling high quality drinks! Looking forward to trying the Turkish coffee once the weather gets a bit cooler. Staff is lovely and it‚Äôs women owned!! Highly recommend everyone visit Cafe Vista and super excited to try more options on their menu. Very happy this cute coffee shop opened up during the gloomy pandemic.'

author: varvara kirylchyk
text: 'Finally tasty coffee found in Hoboken üëçüèº Cozy and warm atmosphere and staff'

author: Jackson Luis
text: "Great coffee and very friendly staff! So glad to have a good cafe in this part of town.\n\nAlso the decor is very cute and pleasing. Can't wait to hang out in there when indoor dining returns!"

author: Dan Schrotter
text: 'Amazing coffee ;) Owner is amazing'
